about.paragraph1: I’m a recent graduate in Electronics, Communication, and Information Engineering from Tribhuvan University, IOE, Pashchimanchal Campus, with a strong foundation in embedded systems and signal processing.
about.paragraph2: I’ve worked on satellite and IoT-based projects at ORION Space Nepal and am currently contributing to wireless sensor networks and robotics at NAST. My experience spans LoRa communication, robotic automation, and Wi-Fi sensing, with additional expertise in full-stack web development.
about.paragraph3: Feel free to check out my resume or reach out via email for potential collaboration.
about.researchInterests: My research interests include Electronics, Machine Learning, IoT, and Mobile Computing.

responsibilities: Co-ordinated Robo-rookies, teaching PCB design and C programming.
Winner of WRC Explorator-V, WRC art competition, and Intersamaj presentation.

experience.company: Nepal Academy of Science and Technology (NAST)
description: Developing wireless sensor networks for early warning systems.
Researching tomato picking robots using robotic arms and imitation learning.
Handling electronics for projects like hydrogen fuel cells and GPS data loggers.

experience.advisor: Er. Jiten Thapa and Er. Rishav Mani Sharma
description: Researched LoRa-based sensor networks in the UHF band.
Engineered educational satellites (CanSat, CUBEEK) for global space training programs (20+ countries).
Developed web application for real-time LoRa data monitoring.
Contributed to real-world IoT solutions like "Jal."
Conducted training on PCB design and embedded programming (C++).
Worked on projects like micromouse, FPV drone, battlebot, robotic arm.
Represented the club in national events (NIDN, Locus, Mechtrix).
Event co-ordinator for Robo-Rookies, training freshers in mechatronics and robotics.

projects.title: Electronic Voting System using Two-Factor Biometric Authentication
description: Developed a web-based two-factor biometric authentication system for secure e-voting.
Utilized fingerprint for voter info and face verification for casting votes.
Implemented salted SHA256 hashing for voter registration data.
Evaluated with 50 participants, showing improved security and integrity.

projects.title: High Altitude Weather Forecasting using LoRa and Machine Learning
description: Developed a low-cost, real-time weather forecasting system for high altitudes.
Integrated LoRa for cost-effective data transmission in remote areas.
Applied XGBoost for weather prediction from sensor data, addressing sparse data challenges.

projects.title: Deep Learning for Waste Management (YOLO & Delta Arm)
description: Built a robotic delta arm with YOLOv8 for waste classification into Biodegradable, Plastic, Paper, Metal.
Achieved high performance: Precision: 0.94118, Recall: 0.96622, mAP@50: 0.98252.
Enhances waste management through automated categorization.

projects.title: CUBEEK - CubeSat Educational Kit
description: Designed, developed, and tested Cubeek, a 1U educational CubeSat kit (≤ 2 kg/unit).
Includes EPS, OBC, COM (LoRa-based), and Payload for basic sensor data.
Aimed at students for learning satellite construction.

projects.title: EDUCAN - Educational CanSat
description: Created a real-time data dashboard for EDUCAN using Node.js.
Redesigned the receiver-side PCB, reducing production costs.
Helps high school students learn satellite construction basics.

projects.title: SAJILO AMBULANCE - with Triage Prediction
projects.awards: Gritfeat AI Hackathon: AI for Health
description: Uber-like app for ambulance services with triage prediction and hospital recommendations.
Predicts triage (SVM - 70.58% accuracy), disposition (RF - 72.05% accuracy), and length of stay (SVM - 86.76% accuracy) based on vital signs.

projects.title: Software Testing - TECHNERGY Hackathon
projects.awards: 2nd Runner-up out of 20+ teams National-level hackathon
description: Achieved 2nd Runner-up in a national hackathon by Hitachi Energy & Locus 2024.
Gained skills in manual & automated testing, CI/CD pipeline, networking, presentation, and documentation.

honorsAndAwards.title: Poster Presenter - WiFi-HAR: Activity Detection Using Channel State Information
honorsAndAwards.company: International Conference on Science and Technology Information Management System: Practices and Experiences (Organized by NAST and NAM S&T CENTRE)
description: Presented a poster on WiFi-HAR at the International Conference on Science and Technology Information Management System.

honorsAndAwards.title: National 2nd Runner-up - TECHNERGY Hackathon
description: Recognized among top 3 out of 20+ national teams for software testing.

honorsAndAwards.title: 1st Place - Project Expo (Delta Arm)
description: Ranked 1st among 50+ projects for developing a low-cost robotic arm with real-time control.

honorsAndAwards.title: Regional 2nd Place - Robo-Soccer
description: Achieved 2nd place in the regional Robo-Soccer competition.

certifications.title: Machine Learning - Specialization
description: Covered Supervised ML (Regression, Classification), Advanced Learning Algorithms, Unsupervised Learning, Recommenders, and Reinforcement Learning.

certifications.title: GIS Data Acquisition and Map Design
Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap 4
certifications.company: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
